name: Graveyard Scramble!
description:
This is an entry to the Ludum Dare 51 game jam! Everything within was built within 72 hours, based on the theme "every ten seconds." 

Try to survive the night as a vampire stuck in a haunted graveyard! 

Your own devastating magic is a powerful weapon, but it has some drawbacks. It takes 10 seconds to charge a blast, and if you overcharge... well I had fun with that animation.

If you can escape the horde of skeletons for 10 whole minutes, you'll survive the night. Good luck!

Controls:

Arrow keys to move

x to shoot

P to pause/resume

Tips:

-Get orbs for powerups and upgrades!

-Beware the big robed skeletons

-More graves will open as time passes

-Don't hang out on patches of dirt
